block.p: Caitlin Jill Simon, a daughter of Susan R. Simon and L. Linfield Simon of Stockbridge, Mass., was married there yesterday at Wheatleigh, a hotel owned by her parents, to Gregory Alain Huber, a son of Jean B. Huber and Peter J. Huber of Rockford, Ill. Judith Patti, a justice of the peace, officiated.

Ms. Simon, 26, is keeping her name. She was until last month a law clerk for Judge Judith Bartnoff of District of Columbia Superior Court. She graduated magna cum laude from Georgetown University and received a law degree from George Washington University.

Caitlin Jill Simon, a daughter of Susan R. Simon and L. Linfield Simon of Stockbridge, Mass., was married there yesterday at Wheatleigh, a hotel owned by her parents, to Gregory Alain Huber, a son of Jean B. Huber and Peter J. Huber of Rockford, Ill. Judith Patti, a justice of the peace, officiated.

Ms. Simon, 26, is keeping her name. She was until last month a law clerk for Judge Judith Bartnoff of District of Columbia Superior Court. She graduated magna cum laude from Georgetown University and received a law degree from George Washington University.

Mr. Huber, 27, is an assistant professor of political science at Yale and a candidate for a Ph.D. in politics from Princeton. He was until last month a fellow in governmental studies at the Brookings Institution in Washington. He received a bachelor's degree summa cum laude and a master's in political science from Emory University. He also received a master's degree in politics from Princeton. His father is a marketing manager in Rockford for the U.S. Filter Corporation.
